title: NYX Gaming Group and R Franco announce game development and distribution agreement
text:
NYX Gaming Group Ltd.
LAS VEGAS , Sept. 29, 2015 /CNW/ - NYX Gaming Group Limited (TSX VENTURE: NYX) ("NYX Gaming Group"), a market leading content and technology supplier to lotteries, casinos and gaming operators across the globe, and R. Franco announce landmark game development and distribution of Neopolis at G2E.
R Franco, the originators of Slots, AWP and Bingo games at the Spanish market, who this year celebrates 50 years in the gaming industry, and NYX Gaming Group have announced a partnership whereby NYX has developed and will distribute internationally Neopolis in the online iGaming market. Neopolis is only one of the latest and most succesfull games of R .Franco's land based titles which will be released in Las Vegas this week across the NYX portfolio to be distributed via the NYX Open Gaming System, (NYX OGS).
David Flynn , EVP of Business Development for NYX Gaming Group stated, " This is a landmark deal for NYX Gaming Group. Working together with such an influential, successful and established games developer as R. Franco, is an honor for the team at NYX. When it comes to land based slots machines in Spain , R Franco is THE company. Their international reach and historical reputation make an excellent fit with NYX. Their games are excellent performers in the land based environment and we are extremely excited to have the opportunity to deliver this title online using our expert game development team within the Company."
Alejandro Casanova , Director of New Business Development for R. Franco, added "We were looking for a fast moving partner who could provide not only the highest quality development but also international distribution. Besides, in NYX Gaming Group we have found a great partner with which we have reached the very best level of cooperation, understanding and support."
NYX Gaming Group shall be exhibiting at the G2E convention, stand 4032, held in Las Vegas between September 29th and October 1st
ABOUT NYX GAMING GROUP
NYX Gaming Group is headquartered in Las Vegas with development out of Stockholm and Sydney . The group provides flexible gaming solutions to some of the largest lotteries, casinos, poker rooms and I-gaming operators across the globe.
NYX Poker Network, is a leading internet poker network deliver poker solutions for online poker operators world-wide.
Game development arm NextGen Gaming is the industry's leading platform agnostic provider of engaging, repeat play Slots, providing entertainment for players and profits for Operators.
The technology division, NYX Interactive, specialize in developing gaming system solutions for World Lottery Association members, media companies and both private and publicly listed Gaming companies worldwide. Through its Open Platform System (OPS™), operators can take advantage of best of breed products and services, including their own, all managed via a single interface. Through its fully hosted Open Gaming System (OGS™), licensees can leverage the best in multi-vendor Casino content from around the world.
The Las Vegas office provides social Poker & Casino solutions out of the group headquarters.
NYX Gaming Group is a proud recipient of the Special Achievement Award from EGR, which recognized the group's consistent growth and innovation in multiple e-gaming verticals.
www.nyxgaminggroup.com
About the R. Franco Group
R. Franco Group is a company whose share capital is 100% Spanish and which, with a 50-year history, retains the spirit and vocation to remain at the forefront of the gaming industry. Incorporated in 1965 by Joaquín and Jesús Franco as a gaming manufacturer and developer in all its strands –the hotel and catering industry, arcades, bingos and casinos– it has a large portfolio of games, many of which have become milestones in the entertaining industry. At present, and within the framework of the strategy led by its New Business Development Manager, Alejandro Casanova , R. Franco Group is immersed in an intense process of convergence of its expertise and know-how with the online gaming universe, an experience started with the recent application for seven online gaming licences and which continues with its active involvement in innovating and pioneering projects.
www.rfranco.com
